attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in the prime minister
attributes.background: Remove Boris Johnson from the position of Prime minister due to his lack of being truthful and blatant disregard for the law. And hold all accountable for there actions.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or the Government to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
